1. Amazon’s new Alexa voice assistant will use Claude AI  The Verge
  2. Ask Claude: Amazon turns to Anthropic's AI for Alexa revamp  Reuters
  3. Alexa's big AI upgrade could be powered by Claude – and that might give us truly smart speakers  TechRadar
  4. Amazon Alexa Is Getting Claude AI in October Revamp: Report  CNET
  5. Amazon launching paid-version of Alexa  CBS News
